gameDetails.name: Fluxx: BoardGameGeek Expansion
gameDetails.description: Fluxx: BoardGameGeek Expansion is an 8 card deck full of fun additions to any game of Fluxx!  Now, win the game by creating BoardGameGeek (using the new "The Geek" and "Board Game" keepers, combined with the new "BoardGameGeek.com" goal of course). Shake up the game by playing the new "Roshambo Showdown" action! Or, use your BGG membership to your advantage with the new "Geek Bonus" rule!
